title: GamGox
author: GamGox
created_time: May 14, 2023, 12:01:19 PMLast edit: May 22, 2023, 08:46:48 AM by GamGox
content: Fellow Bitcointalk!Today, I want to introduce you to our exceptional Telegram marketing service, which stands head and shoulders above the rest in terms of quality and effectiveness.With over five years of experience in Telegram marketing, I've had the privilege of helping various web3 and web2 projects achieve their Telegram marketing goals and build strong communities.In a nutshell, our Telegram marketing service is a game-changer.We're here to help you achieve your marketing goals and build a thriving Telegram community.Of course, each one of them can be potential customers of your project.What is our offer for you?Send a private message to Telegram users.We can promote your web3/web2 project or even your Telegram channel/group by sending a private message to thousands active users in any specific Telegram groups.Price:$0.20 per private messagee.g. 1000 private messages = $200What is the minimum and maximum order limits?Min order: 1000 private messagesMax order: 200,000 private messagesRevenue sharing to our partner/s:40% of SellPlease feel free to ask any question or share your thoughts in the comments below.For order, please leave your message here or Telegram:https://t.me/qbit_LenaBest,

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: What are the chances that you won't get your account flagged and even deleted by telegram for such activities?They limit you if there are some good number of reports against your account.Please tell me this -If you are sending DMs to people for Web3/web2 projects, it means that if someone asks you to DM their provided content and it holds a contract address that you need to circulate at the very time when a project launches their token (because the person who gives you the content with the contract address is a scammer), will you still do it for money or do you have some rules in place?

comments.author: GamGox
comments.body: Quote from: 2double0 on May 15, 2023, 01:18:26 PMWhat are the chances that you won't get your account flagged and even deleted by telegram for such activities?They limit you if there are some good number of reports against your account.I appreciate your consideration.We are using thousands Telegram account which registered with thousands virtual numbers, so the chance of block/ban/delete or flagged by scam is not our problem. It never been happened but In the worst case if this happens, our customers' business will not be affected and we will most likely lose only a few Telegram account which is related to us.Quote from: 2double0 on May 15, 2023, 01:18:26 PMPlease tell me this -If you are sending DMs to people for Web3/web2 projects, it means that if someone asks you to DM their provided content and it holds a contract address that you need to circulate at the very time when a project launches their token (because the person who gives you the content with the contract address is a scammer), will you still do it for money or do you have some rules in place?As a human being, humanity is more important than money.We always block scammers/cheaters/rugpull projects by checking that project smart contract codes and social media networks.

comments.author: GamGox
comments.body: Join Our Profit-Sharing Program - 40% Revenue Share!Attention professionals seeking a lucrative opportunity!We have an exciting proposition for you. Earn a substantial 40% of our revenue by leveraging your negotiation skills with dApp projects.Determine if they require our exceptional marketing services and reap the financial rewards.This flexible work-from-home opportunity allows you to set your own schedule and maximize your earning potential. As our trusted partner, you'll play a vital role in identifying clients who can benefit from our top-notch marketing solutions.Ready to embark on a profitable journey? Reach out to us directly and let's collaborate to achieve mutual success.Hit me up on Telegram:https://t.me/qbit_Lena

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: GamGox on May 15, 2023, 03:19:58 PMWe are using thousands Telegram account which registered with thousands virtual numbers, so the chance of block/ban/delete or flagged by scam is not our problem. It never been happened but In the worst case if this happens, our customers' business will not be affected and we will most likely lose only a few Telegram account which is related to us.So how's the conversion, the community is advising against unsolicited messages and there are account settings that will not allow receiving of messages, I'm one of those who do not accept unsolicited emails, if not part of my contact.I just hit block and delete for any incoming messages so that would be wasting a lot of 20 cents for every block message and there's no guarantee of conversion either.Part of ethical business is avoiding spamming because it will harm the reputation of the projects, literally, you are promoting projects through spam which is not good.

comments.author: GamGox
comments.created_time: May 23, 2023, 08:45:24 AMLast edit: May 23, 2023, 10:08:36 AM by GamGox
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on May 22, 2023, 10:24:43 AMQuote from: GamGox on May 15, 2023, 03:19:58 PMWe are using thousands Telegram account which registered with thousands virtual numbers, so the chance of block/ban/delete or flagged by scam is not our problem. It never been happened but In the worst case if this happens, our customers' business will not be affected and we will most likely lose only a few Telegram account which is related to us.So how's the conversion, the community is advising against unsolicited messages and there are account settings that will not allow receiving of messages, I'm one of those who do not accept unsolicited emails, if not part of my contact.I just hit block and delete for any incoming messages so that would be wasting a lot of 20 cents for every block message and there's no guarantee of conversion either.Part of ethical business is avoiding spamming because it will harm the reputation of the projects, literally, you are promoting projects through spam which is not good. This is a form of advertising, similar to all other advertisements on the web. Some people have issues with ads that play during YouTube videos, but can this type of advertising harm the credibility of that project which published ads? No.On the contrary, it demonstrates that the project uses various advertising methods to showcase its products to the targeted community and people.We will include your Telegram username in the private message ads so that users can connect with you. As a result, users can choose to establish contact with you or visit your website to utilize your product.As a marketing manager, you need to have the ability to showcase your product to the right audience with the lowest possible cost and high returns. We have implemented this advertising model for several different projects and channels, and the results have been very positive and satisfactory.It has helped projects secure funding in liquidity pools, crypto news and crypto signal channels, launchpad, CEX and yield farming etc.QuoteEmail marketing remains one of the top marketing channels because of the stability, control, and affordability it offers businesses. As an owned media channel, email marketing gives marketers more control over their messaging and the scope of their reach.Mar 15, 2023 - SOURCESo compare Email marketing with our Telegram marketing. Users can check the message with just one click. Easy to use! Also Imagine the significantly positive impacts to the projects.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: GamGox on May 23, 2023, 08:45:24 AMThis is a form of advertising, similar to all other advertisements on the web. Some people have issues with ads that play during YouTube videos, but can this type of advertising harm the credibility of that project which published ads? No.You have a wrong interpretation of good advertising, try to send an unsolicited message here in Bitcointalk and you will get a tag, try to send a private promotional message on Facebook and you will be blocked, try to send unsolicited emails through Gmail and your emails will be reported as spam and your account reported.When it comes to advertising there are ethics that should be followed and sending spam advertising is a big violation of the privacy of one's individuals.You don't compare your spam promotion with Youtube because they have a platform to show ads and when you sign up to use YouTube you agree and have consented to show ads on your viewing experience, in your case, people who will receive your spam do not consent to your action.QuoteOn the contrary, it demonstrates that the project uses various advertising methods to showcase its products to the targeted community and people.Targeted audiences are those who agreed to receive ads and promotional not surprising them with ads without their consent this is simply spamming, or unsolicited messages.QuoteWe will include your Telegram username in the private message ads so that users can connect with you. As a result, users can choose to establish contact with you or visit your website to utilize your product.People easily lose their trust in projects that prefer a method of spamming to promote their projectthe bottom line here is we have a law against spamming and respecting one's privacy and it ha a very stiff penalty.QuoteEach separate email in violation of the CAN-SPAM Act is subject to penalties of up to $50,120, so non-compliance can be costly. CAN-SPAM Act: A Compliance Guide for Businesshttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAN-SPAM_Act_of_2003
